title: Will human resources guarantee the registration of millions of 'illegal immigrants ' to vote?
subtitle: In an editorial article of The Daily Sinal, former Vice President Mike Pines criticized the draft law on reform of the voting rights of Democrats.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: The 2021 People's Act, also known as the United States H.R.1, would ensure that "millions of illegal immigrants are quickly registered to vote" by forcing states to adopt comprehensive postal ballots, early voting, voter registration on the same day, online voter registration, and automatic voter registration.
